com.iver.cit.gvsig.gui.toolListeners
Class WCSZoomPixelCursorListener

java.lang.Object
  com.iver.cit.gvsig.gui.toolListeners.WCSZoomPixelCursorListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.tools.Listeners.PointListener, com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.tools.Listeners.ToolListener
public class WCSZoomPixelCursorListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.tools.Listeners.PointListener

Listener that executes a zoom in operation in the associated MapControl, having as center the point selected.

Listens a single click of any mouse's button.

The zoom in factor will depend on the maximum resolution of the WCS layers in the MapControl.

Author:
Nacho Brodin (brodin_ign@gva.es)
